extracted-table.table-caption: Pearson correlations between behavioural measures and RSFC between the GMFA seed region and the eight clusters.

fn.p: Note. SP = spelling score; HW = handwriting score; READ = reading score; Cluster 1 = bilateral frontoparietal; Cluster 2 = right frontoparietal; Cluster 3 = bilateral limbic; Cluster 4 = right limbic; Cluster 5 = left temporo-limbic; Cluster 6 = left temporo-limbic; Cluster 7 = left temporal; Cluster 8 = bilateral cerebellum. * p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01.
